  • Method Details

    • guess

      public LinkedList<String> guess(Character guess, LinkedList<String> words)
      Given a list of words and a guessed letter, calculate which group of words with different revealed letters would keep the group of words the biggest returns the words, keeps the revealed letters internal, but it can be called with getRevealedLetters
      Parameters:
      guess - guessed letter
      words - group of words
      Returns:
      biggest group of words after being sorted by the frequency of the guess letter

    • guessesRemain

      public int guessesRemain()
      Returns how many guesses you have remaining
      Returns:
      amount of remaining guesses

    • hasGuesses

      public boolean hasGuesses()
      Checks if there are guesses remaining
      Returns:
      if guesses remain

    • getRevealedLetters

      public String getRevealedLetters()
      Returns the status of which letters have been 'found' and which ones haven't '-' means it hasn't been found
      Returns:
      a string representing which letters have been found

    • getIncorrectGuesses

      public int getIncorrectGuesses()
      Returns how many incorrect guesses it took to guess the word
      Returns:
      amount of incorrect guesses chosen
